text:
Dick - in this letter, Wheatley is merely suggesting a sample
rating sheet for his programs & arparently is not requesting an
answer.
My opinion on "We Human Beings": Very good show for what we*re try¬
ing to broadcast, A single-voice narration of certain periods of
life or of problem situations. Well-produced with sound-effects,
music BG, etc. The kind of production I think we could do our¬
selves if we had time.
We’ve finished the series of seven programs.
